title: INSPIREMUSIC: INTEGRATING SUPER RESOLUTION AND LARGE LANGUAGE MODEL FOR HIGH-FIDELITY LONG-FORM MUSIC GENERATION
author: Tongyi Lab (Alibaba Group), ...
relevance_why: This work introduces a novel framework for high-fidelity music generation integrating super-resolution and large language models, which can inform advancements in audio generation techniques and multimodal models relevant to Haohe Liu's research in audio and music processing.
background: Combining various generative models to produce high-quality, long-form music from text and audio prompts while maintaining coherence and fidelity.
contribution: INSPIREMUSIC introduces a unified framework that leverages the strengths of super-resolution flow-matching models and autoregressive transformers to produce high-fidelity audio with long-form coherence.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous models struggled to maintain audio quality over long durations and lacked effective control over musical structure.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work improves on prior methods by utilizing a novel audio tokenizer and a super-resolution approach to enhance both temporal coherence and audio fidelity.

key_innovation: The unique integration of an autoregressive transformer with a super-resolution flow-matching model allows for the generation of longer musical compositions with improved fidelity.
real_world_impact: Inspires advancements in music generation technology, potentially benefiting musicians and content creators by providing tools for more nuanced and high-quality music production.
limitations: The framework might require significant computational resources, and specific conditions for optimal functioning may limit broader accessibility.

new_terms.super-resolution: **Super-resolution** refers to techniques that increase the resolution or fidelity of audio or visual content by filling in high-frequency details.
new_terms.autoregressive model: **Autoregressive model** is a type of statistical model used for modeling time series data and predicting future values based on past observations.

open_sourcing: The code and pre-trained models are released at https://github.com/FunAudioLLM/InspireMusic.
